title: Create New Job Requisition
description: A hiring manager wants to create a new job requisition for a 'Software Engineer' position in the HR system.

tasks.description: Gather job details from the hiring manager (title, department, job description, salary range).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information for the new role.

tasks.description: Create a new job requisition in the Applicant Tracking System (ATS) using the collected details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a draft requisition in the ATS.

tasks.description: Submit the requisition for approval from the department head and finance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly initiates the approval workflow in the ATS.
